feed.title: Combined summary - Wallet class merged -- rebasing needed

entry.title: Combined summary - Wallet class merged -- rebasing needed
entry.summary: The context mentions that sipa has pulled his wallet code movement and wallet class stuff. However, the Wallet import/export and crypto will require a rebase. Apart from these big ticket items, there are other codes as well that need to merge in the short term. The message is signed by Jeff Garzik, who works at exMULTI, Inc.
